[vc_row el_class=”overflow resource-page” css=”.vc_custom_1570735667471{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Actionable tips to selling marketing automation services

[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron” css=”.vc_custom_1543590290174{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Not sure how to work marketing automation into your agency pricing model?

Renowned agency consultant and coach Karl Sakas discusses how to package marketing automation services within a proven framework. He dives into how you can:

  • Segment your agency services into 3 easy tiers
  • Price & bundle marketing automation within each tier
  • Get more revenue per client by switching up your approach

[/vc_column_text]

Karl Sakas

Agency Advisor Sakas and Company

“I’ve personally advised hundreds of agency owners across the globe. In my work as an agency consultant, I’ve noticed a key difference between agencies that perform well vs. those that struggle.”

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]
